tool_description: Updates nameserver settings for domains at the registrar level and validates nameserver configurations for proper DNS resolution.

domain_name.description: Domain name to configure nameservers for

nameservers.description: List of nameserver hostnames to set

error_messages: Invalid domain format: Domain name must be a valid fully qualified domain name.
Insufficient nameservers: At least 2 nameservers are required.
Too many nameservers: Maximum 8 nameservers are allowed.
Invalid nameserver format: Nameserver hostnames must be valid fully qualified domain names.
Nameserver validation failed: One or more nameservers are not responding to DNS queries.
Registrar update failed: Unable to update nameservers at the registrar level.
usage: Provide domain name and array of nameserver hostnames. The tool validates nameservers if enabled and updates the domain's nameserver configuration at the registrar. Changes may take time to propagate.

propagation_time.description: Estimated time for changes to fully propagate
